author: potuz
content: Why do we default to full envelopes for RPC for finalized blocks? we should have a way of serving the blinded objects, so that we can backfill without having to download twice the full transaction history

author: stefanbratanov
content: yeah we had internal discussion about that, but that means spec needs to be changed I suppose

author: potuz
content: isn't this just an API thing?

author: stefanbratanov
content: What do you mean? We still have to send the whole ssz via RPC as per current p2p.md spec

author: potuz
content: yeah for the usual case of p2p requests it's fine to send the full ssz, but that should not be used for backfilling, nodes should not requests finalized payloads except when backfilling

author: potuz
content: anyway, I won't worry about this and let people choose whatever suit their team, these standarization issues tend to drag forever
